short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension auto-scales the loudness of the audio on the current tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Volume Harmony is a Chrome extension that ensures a consistent listening experience across websites by automatically adjusting audio and video volume to a user-set level. It also lets users set a global playback speed for all media.

Technical Details:

	•	Uses AudioContext API to control volume.
	•	Adjusts playback speed via media element properties.
	•	Saves user preferences in Chrome storage and applies them across all tabs.

Note: You may need to refresh your tab to ensure settings take effect.
